body.p:
390
May 19' 4
Lieut Col. B. J. Spalding
37: Ky Infy Vols.
Sir

By direction of the Governor you are hereby authorized to re-enlist for 3 years service all, or any portion of your command, and also men from any one years organization who are willing to re-enlist -- you will take any action under this authority, whenever in your judgment you can best promote the interests of the service and will report progress to these Head Quarters.

Respy
Your obedt. Servt.
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
